actionCalls.name: myRule_15_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Message if Product goes to Inactive

actionCalls.name: myRule_9_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Slack message for Zero Inventory

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.conditionLogic: (((1 OR 2) AND 3) OR (4 AND 5)) AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Zero Inventory for Product, Hotel Stay and Package

value.stringValue: OR( AND([Product2].RecordType.Name <> 'Package', PRIORVALUE([Product2].Current_Inventory__c) > 0, [Product2].Current_Inventory__c <= 0, [Product2].Primary_Price_Book__c.IsActive , [Product2].Available__c = false), AND([Product2].RecordType.Name = 'Package', [Product2].Primary_Price_Book__c.IsActive , [Product2].Available__c = false , VALUE(PRIORVALUE([Product2].Package_Inventory__c)) > 0, VALUE([Product2].Package_Inventory__c) <= 0) )
